pullrequest.title: Components Part 2: Move header files to component folders

content.raw:
moving includes to a subfolder would be a harder migration, since downstream users would need to update their `#include` statements. we could make dummy headers that generate a `#warning` (like in this [old gazebo pull request](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/638/fix-for-775-deprecate-headers-that-require/diff#chg-tools/issue_775_generator.bash))

but if we move the headers to a subfolder, it raises the question of whether the types should be in another namespace too (`ignition::common::graphics`), and that makes the migration even worse. so we did it this way to minimize work
